title: 306.04 FAILURE TO KEEP REGISTER; FORFEITURE.
text: Every actuary, or secretary performing the duties of an actuary, failing to keep a register of burials and to record in it all interments and cremations, shall forfeit not less than $2 nor more than $10 for every failure to keep a register or record the required information for the benefit of the school fund of the district in which the cemetery, mausoleum, or crematory is located.
